results.title: Spider-Man: No Way Home
results.overview: Peter Parker's secret identity is revealed, bringing his Super Hero responsibilities into conflict with his normal life and putting those he cares about most at risk.

results.title: Sonic the Hedgehog 2
results.overview: After settling in Green Hills, Sonic is eager to prove he has what it takes to be a true hero.

results.title: Venom: Let There Be Carnage
results.overview: Eddie Brock struggles to adjust to his new life as the host of the alien symbiote Venom, while serial killer Cletus Kasady also becomes host to an alien symbiote.

results.title: The Batman
results.overview: In his second year of fighting crime, Batman uncovers corruption in Gotham City that connects to his own family.
